text: Brig. Gen. Munir Al Yafi (born; 1974 – 1 August 2019) was a Yemeni support forces commander. He was the leader of the Southern Movement's military arm during the Yemeni Civil War until his death. He was killed on 1 August 2019 alongside 35 other people, during a missile attack on a military parade in Aden, Yemen carried out by the Houthis. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:2019 deaths Category:Yemeni political people Category:People murdered in Yemen Category:Place of birth missing
title: Munir Al Yafi
